title: Hire designer for SaaS/Product Blog UI Kit
body:
Hey everyone,

Hereby the official vote to hire a designer to design the SaaS/Product Blog UI Kit

Assignment: SaaS/Product Blog UI Kit
Payment: 0.5Ξ ($1,908.52) or 0.88Ξ ($3,339.90) with bonus applied.

We've had many designers apply for this bounty. Below are the applications that got the most upvotes on Discord.
______

Name: Thomas Oldenburger
Figma Link: https://www.figma.com/file/YJUAtSwvirzzre9vuhGi8f/RareBlocks-Blog-UI-kit-application?node-id=0%3A1
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/917374681286320179
______

Name: Vandini Joshee
Figma Link: https://www.figma.com/file/Slha9z7IaBNRe6iBBlYeUh/Saas%2F-Product-blog-bounty---rareblocks?node-id=15%3A1445
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/920282240645218355
______

Name: Ach Syafii
Figma Link: https://www.figma.com/file/mKZNAaag77BH9lTYs5X3Vo/Blog?node-id=0%3A1
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/919799184545161216

______

Who do we want to hire for this application?
author: 0x1bCbbd7f9415768338f92A9B8758fa4ABeE4FFD0
